title: Why is it considered a must for literature to be reviewed by any researcher? - Quora

response.answer_text: Reviewing the literature let's you get a good grounding in the theory and research in your area of study.It let's you know what has previously been studied and/or found in the area, and also what remains to be studied I.e. lacuna you can seek to fill. Giving you the way forward.Exposes you to issues and challenges in studying your subject matter.
